SELECT USER_ID AS USERID, ORGNA_ID AS ORGNAID, USER_NAME AS USERNAME, PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, USER_ORDER AS USERORDER, USER_LEVEL AS USERLEVEL, REAL_NAME AS REALNAME, SEX AS SEX, AGE AS AGE, MOBILE AS MOBILE, PHONE AS PHONE, EMAIL AS EMAIL, USER_DESC AS USERDESC FROM C_USER T WHERE T.USER_NAME LIKE '%$value$%' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT T.* FROM C_USER T WHERE T.REAL_NAME LIKE '%$value$%' AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT T.* FROM C_USER T WHERE T.User_Id = #value#
SELECT T.* FROM C_USER T,C_USERROLE UR WHERE T.USER_ID = UR.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = #value#
SELECT T.* FROM C_USER T WHERE T.ORGNA_ID = #value#

SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM C_RESOURCE A, C_RELATION B WHERE A.RES_ID = B.RES_ID AND (B.USER_ID = #userid# OR (B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM C_USERROLE, C_USER WHERE C_USERROLE.USER_ID = #userid#))) AND PARENT_ID = #parentid# ORDER BY RES_ORDER

SELECT T.*, LEVEL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM U_RESOURCE A, U_RELATION B WHERE A.RES_ID = B.RES_ID AND (B.USER_ID = #userid# OR (B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM U_USER_ROLE, U_USER WHERE U_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #userid#)) OR B.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT U_R_ROLE_ID FROM U_ROLE_PARENT START WITH ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM U_USER_ROLE, U_USER WHERE U_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = #userid#) CONNECT BY PRIOR U_R_ROLE_ID = ROLE_ID))) T START WITH RES_ID IN (SELECT RES_ID FROM U_RESOURCE WHERE PARENT_ID = #root#) CONNECT BY PRIOR RES_ID = PARENT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY RES_ORDER

SELECT A.*, B.CN FROM C_ORGNIZATION A, (SELECT T.PARENT_ID, COUNT(T.ORGNA_ID) CN FROM C_ORGNIZATION T GROUP BY T.PARENT_ID) B WHERE A.ORGNA_ID = B.PARENT_ID(+) AND A.PARENT_ID = #value# ORDER BY A.ORGNA_ORDER
SELECT T.* FROM C_RESOURCE T ORDER BY T.PARENT_ID,T.RES_ORDER
